description: * 下载     ```       git clone git@code.aliyun.com:task2016/project_wang.git     ``` * 进入目录     ```       cd project_wang     ``` * 安装依赖     ```       npm install      ``` * 启动项目     ```       node app.js     ``` * 监听     ```       gulp watcher     ``` * 访问     ```       http://127.0.0.1:16927     ```
